summary: This is a change to the Imperial Crested Helmet. I always hated the helm's crest as it looked so cheap. Let's make that crest actually look like a crest that an officer or hero would actually wear. Out of the 7 years, the imperial armors are still forgotten about and this helmet needed it to be fixed.
descriptionHtml:
Releasing some of my work that was meant for a bigger mod but lost motivation and help.
This is a change to the Imperial Crested Helmet. I always hated the helm's crest as it looked so cheap. Let's make that crest actually look like a crest that an officer or hero would actually wear. Out of the 7 years, the imperial armors are still forgotten about and this helmet needed it to be fixed.

The helmet should look like what it is based off of at least. Right?
[img]https://i.ebayimg.com/images/g/zdcAAOSwx2dYDyQy/s-l300.jpg[/img]

Not much to be said about it.

I know it doesn't look too great but it is better than nothing. Maybe I'll come back to it to make it look better.

Check out my other mods
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89451?]Red Dragon Crown[/url]
